TopicTitle: to the mun part one tutorial glitch

Articles.Content: when i need to change my orbit to get to the Mun ill be fine and everything but once my liquid fuel runs out i will press space to go to the next stage and it wont work, so im left floating in space unable to complete the tutorial.

It sounds like your staging controls might not be working properly. Without more details, such as what sort of computer you have, I don't think too much help can be offered.

Try going into your input settings and either setting the staging controls to spacebar (the key assignments might have screwed up) or something else to see if you can get it to work with some other key.
